name: Orcapult
description:
Glorious battle is all about flinging orcs to victory! Defeat four enemy towers by flinging your orcs at them before your ORCAPULT is destroyed.

Orcapult, while only clocking in at around 4kb, has some nuances to it and it may not be immediately obvious how to play properly, so I very strongly recommend that you take time to read the extensive manual supplied in the zip file. This will ensure that you get the most enjoyment from the game.

This game has been written as part of the retro dev group, Puddle Software (http://puddlesoft.net/).

Thank you for downloading!
